audioText: Sa retraite paisible commence officiellement le mois prochain après quarante années professionnelles.
question: When does his peaceful retirement officially begin?
options: Next month after forty professional years
This year after thirty working years
Next summer after fifty career years
This winter after twenty business years
explanation: The text states 'Sa retraite paisible commence officiellement le mois prochain après quarante années professionnelles' - His peaceful retirement officially begins next month after forty professional years. The noun 'retraite' (retirement) with adverb 'officiellement' (officially) describes career transition timing.
